item.info: Brand new website design! that's right, there's a fresh layout to this amazing website. New features inlcude searching for songs, and my personal favorite, FAVORITES! You read that right, you can now choose which songs you like most! to check out your favorite songs, just head to the "profile" page. **SIDE NOTE** Searching is still very much work in progress, so please be patient. Anyway, enjoy the new design!

Fixed a bug that caused images to display at a size that is far too large. In addition to these bug fixes, I also made the settings save without refreshing the page. Finally, I started work on a new section for the "extras" page, which is flags which I have redesigned, for better or for worse.

Removed early access. I felt that the many visual bugs on this website could be fixed. So instead of creating an entirely new design, I just fixed the bugs in the current design. Thank you for your understanding.
Changed some code in "Early Access".
Modified early access so you no longer have to login to access it.
You can now see what's being added to the site! Just head over to "Extras" and scroll down.
Fixed a bug which caused the page to redirect twice on the "404" page.
Added a "404 Not Found" page.
Fixed a bug that caused the animations to occur on light mode, even when animations are toggled off.
Fixed a bug that caused some menu items to have the top clipped off. Also fixed a bug that caused the close nav button to continue showing after closing navigation (mobile bug).
Added animation to the page navigation.

Added another option to "settings", which is the ability to enable or disable smooth animations. Another feature coming soon is the ability to change the timing functions of the animations. For example, you could switch the current "Cubic Bezier" for a linear animation.
Renamed "Piano Chords" to "Extras" and added a new page to "Extras" called "AI Images".
Finished adding my new album "Real Love", and fixed a few more bugs. Navigation now drops from the top instead of the side, and the links now resize to fit differnet screen sizes.
Removed Tutorials. Ranamed "Piano Chords Reference" to "Piano Chords". Removed ads and fixed bugs.
Added tutorials and piano chord references. Piano chord reference is incomplete.

Added some more options to the navigation, and added more music. In addition to this, I also changed the color scheme of the site from pink to blue, and made the navigation more reactive. For bug fixes, I fixed an issue that was causing some songs not to play. Also... GLOW EFFECTS!!!!!
The UI has been completely redesigned from the bottom up, with mobile users in mind!
The website has officially been published. In addition to this, the "Back to Top" button on the "news" page has been updated to always show at the bottom right side of the screen.
The page is going into official deployment soon! I'll give an update when it does.
The News Has Changed! That's right, I've changed the way the news page renders. This should make the page run much faster. I've also made the site more responsive, so have fun looking around!

Settings have been updated! You can now customize the home page feed, adding or removing the news/projects. The page now uses toggle switches, for a fun interactive experience! I am slowly releasing the songs for my new album "LOVE, HEARTBREAK, REPEAT. As of publishing this update, there are curently two songs released in the album, with a bonus track "Spirit". Hope ya'll enjoy this album!
I updated the "twitter" icons to match Elon Musk's Rebranding. Why did he do this? I don't know, but I don't like it.
I have updated the button interaction on the music page.

I have created a work-around for the bug on windows, which is to simply replace the original icons with emojis. To enable this, click the nav button in the top right, which will open settings. There you can change the unicode options: click "disable". That should load emojis instead of icons. I also fixed the link to my dark humor website, so you can actually open it now.

Yes, the bug on windows still exists. I'm sorry it hasn't been fixed yet. I added a loading icon, so the wait time is a little more justified. Great News! The layout of the music page has been completed! Check out the amazing new design, with contrasting colors for easy readability and so much more!

There is still a bug on windows which fails to load icons. I'm still working to fix it. I have added a "projects" section to the home page, so you can see some of the things I've made or are working on. The redesign for the music page is nearly complete, I just need to add the finishing touches. Thats all for now, have fun ya'll!

I am aware of a bug on windows where the icons may not load. I've added "title" tags to the buttons, so you can simply hover your cursor over the buttons to see what the button does. I am also updating the layout of the "Music" page. Please be patient while I work, as it could take a few weeks.
Mekayla has been publicly released. The next three songs for "STATIC" may not be published. I added a contact form button im probably gonna change it. I hav stoped caring about grammar..
Due to technical difficulties, the release date for "Static" has been pushed to Saturday, June 10th, 2023, at 12:00 P.M MST.
After careful consideration, I have decided to re-release "Mekayla" as unlisted. Please note that this is subject to change, and may be publicly released or made private again.
New features have been added to the webiste. This includes toggleable smooth scroll, and the ability to support me on my socials. Speaking of socials, go check them out!
The music page has been completed! New songs will be released regularly, so be on the lookout!
I've remixed "Stay High" by Juice WRLD... again. Don't worry, this trap remix is much better than the last. "Stay High (Trap Remix)" drops on June 10th, 2023 at 12:00 P.M MST!
Pro Tip: You can enable dark mode in settings! For real though, I spent a lot of time making it work, far longer than I needed to.
Recently, I had published a love song titled "Mekayla". Sadly, I had to take it down. I will not go into detail about what happened, but most of you can probably assume what did happened.

I had previously announced a few songs and albums on my Youtube. LIQUID (the album) has been discontinued, and will not be released, as a few songs from it have been moved to "Static". However, my single "WEAK" will be released. The release date is currently set for June 3rd, 2023 at 12:00 P.M MST.
The current release date of "Static" is set for June 5th, 2023. However, as with every song and album I've released so far, there will likely be complications that cause delays for the release.
The Website is now up and running!
